programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Tim Reid (6/19/85)
programme.desc: The genius behind WKRP’s Venus Flytrap, Tim Reid describes his experience auditioning for The Tonight Show.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Bruce Dern (12/14/72)
programme.desc: ‘The use of “Bruce,”’ grouses actor Bruce Dern is Hollywood-speak for a “delicate” actor.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '90s - Robin Williams (10/14/81)
programme.desc: In his first appearance on The Tonight Show, Robin admits he was a geeky kid, discusses herpes, and more.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Buddy Hackett (5/7/74)
programme.desc: Buddy Hackett reads poetry and Cass Elliot makes one of her final TV appearances.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Talk Show Greats - Dick Cavett (9/20/83)
programme.desc: Fellow talk show host Dick Cavett talks about his early days in the business.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Don Rickles (3/1/78)
programme.desc: No one is safe when Don Rickles visits the set!

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - David Brenner (11/1/83)
programme.desc: David Brenner jokes about Indian music, chewing gum with liquid centers, and his favorite restaurant: IHOP.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Victor Buono (8/16/73)
programme.desc: Victor Buono drops in to talk about his recently released book of poetry, and to cut up with Johnny and Ed.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of George Carlin (11/26/86)
programme.desc: Carlin and Johnny talk about the wonders of Zest soap. Plus, Flat Nose the tree-climbing dog.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '70s - Ricardo Montalban (8/1/73)
programme.desc: Ricardo Montalban reveals his obsession with bullfighting.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Olivia Newton-John (11/12/76)
programme.desc: Olivia Newton-John sings 2 of her numerous chart-topping tunes and fills in Johnny on growing up in Australia.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Walter Matthau (12/10/81)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau regale Johnny with tales of making 5 movies together and a stunt gone wrong.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Betty White (11/12/81)
programme.desc: Betty White critiques Johnny’s sketch comedy performance and quizzes him on the wonders of nature.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Garry Shandling (5/17/89)
programme.desc: Only on The Tonight Show will you see Patrick Swayze talking about a song he wrote called "Sweet June Farts."

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Tim Allen (1/29/92)
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Melanie Griffith and......the great dog photos by famed photographer William Wegman

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Elia Kazan (8/17/78)
programme.desc: Two-time Oscar-winning director Elia Kazan explains why writing his novel was harder than filmmaking.
